name: Venturepreneurs' Organisation
goal:
-Establishing personal and professional relationships between young entrepreneurs as well as the investors in order to exchange valuable peer to peer experiences
-Creating a forum in which the members share their personal and professional experiences in order to enrich each otherÂ´s knowledge
-Establishing a mutual support system in order to be able to advise each other in a critical situation, both on a personal and professional level
interests: Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
- Participation in the Consultation on Entrepreneurship 2020 Action Plan - Small and medium sized enterprises (SME) - Enterprise and Industry (July 2012).

- Collaboration with Swedish entrepreneurial women association - Pokerface

- Collaboration with entrepreneurship conferences in Spain - The Challengers, This Way Up and 4YFN
